name: Neoxa
description: Neoxa is a blockchain featuring assets and the ability to obtain cryptocurrency while playing various games and proof of work mining. While other cryptocurrencies use only Proof of Work(PoW), Neoxa uses PoW and Proof of Game(PoG). PoG is a new way for gamers to participate in blockchain technology, simply by playing games. Until now, the minable cryptocurrency communities and gaming communities have been separated by a graphic card shortage. With Neoxa, both these communities can come together and get a piece of the block.
